original_text: What you did, you did secretly. But I will cause this to happen in the light of day, so that all Israel can see it.” ’
korean_text: 너는 은밀히 행하였으나 나는 온 이스라엘 앞에서 백주에 이 일을 행하리라 하셨나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: What you did, you did secretly
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 행한 일을 네가 은밀히 행했으나

sentences.original_text: But I will cause this to happen
so that all Israel can see it
